metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15672 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The read_header function in libavcodec/ffv1dec.c in FFmpeg 2.4 and 3.3.4 and possibly earlier allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted MP4 file, which triggers an out-of-bounds read.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
